div.p: 67/R7351, unit 402, VPRS 1207/P000 inward registered correspondence, VA 865 Department of the Treasurer, Public Record Office, Victoria.

The account of judgements referred to in my memorandum of the 19 inst.
See M to E. Symonds, 19 December 1867 (in this edition as 67-12-19b). The file was referred to M by Symonds on 24 December 1867 because the certificate of judgment referred to in M's letter appeared not to have reached the Treasury. The expenditure was associated with the Duke of Edinburgh's visit. was transmitted to the treasury on that day, and the sum claimed £114.1/9d (being portion of the total expenditure for improvements of the walks at Toorak) was paid on the 24. inst. Adjustment of Advance appended
Appended document not found.
